info.title: DailyMed
info.description: The DailyMed database contains drug labeling, submitted to the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) by companies. This includes boxed warnings, indications, dosage and administration, contraindications, warnings and precautions, adverse reactions, drug interactions, information about use in specific populations, and other important information for healthcare practitioners. The National Library of Medicine (NLM), a National Institutes of Health (NIH) institute, provides DailyMed to the public.
